**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 10,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This staff of magically hardened wood is topped with a silver sculpture depicting magical runic symbols. When used as a weapon, a staff of power is a +2 greater striking staff. Voluntarily destroying a staff of power unleashes an incredible blast of energy. When wielding the staff, you can Interact to break it. This releases a 30-foot-burst magical explosion centered on the staff. This deals 2d8 force damage per charge remaining in the staff (DC 40 basic Reflex save). You automatically critically fail your save. A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies instantly; this is a death effect.
  • **1st** [_ray of enfeeblement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
  • **2nd** [_continual flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=50)
  • **3rd** [_levitate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=170)
  • **4th** [_globe of invulnerability_](/Spells.aspx?ID=137), [_paralyze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=213)
  • **5th** [_magic missile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=180)
  • **6th** [_wall of force_](/Spells.aspx?ID=363)
  • **7th** [_cone of cold_](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172)
**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
name: Staff of Power
